text: Jean-Jacques Barthe (27 June 1936 â€“ 10 June 2022) was a French PCF politician. Barthe was born in Calais, France. He was a member of the French National Assembly from 1973 until 1988. Barthe was also the Mayor of Calais from 1971 to 2000. Barthe was also a member of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe from 1981 until 1982. Barthe died on 10 June 2022 in Calais at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Jean-Jacques Barthe
